data.text: James Wang, analyst at ARK Invest, joins CNBC's "Closing Bell" to discuss what he'll be looking out for once Apple reports earnings Tuesday.

data.title: Apple Earnings Preview: 4 Critical Things to Watch For
data.text: Apple earnings will shock the market Tuesday, one way or another. Watch these four things when Apple stock reports.

data.title: Apple is working on phone cameras that use lasers to sense how far objects are, top analyst says
data.text: Apple is working on iPhones expected to launch in 2020 with rear cameras equipped with a new kind of sensor that enables them to sense how far away things are, according to TF Securities analyst Ming-Chi Kuo.

data.title: What to Expect When Apple Reports Late on Tuesday
data.text: Apple Inc. (NASDAQ: AAPL) is scheduled to release its fiscal third-quarter financial results after the markets close on Tuesday.

data.title: Earnings Preview: What To Expect From Apple On Tuesday.
data.text: Apple is expected to report earnings of $2.10/share on $53.31 billion in revenue. Meanwhile, the so-called Whisper number is $2.18.

data.title: Pricing will be in focus for next year's iPhones, says analyst
data.text: Amit Daryanani, Evercore's Apple analyst, joins "Squawk Alley" to discuss Apple's outlook ahead of earnings and what to expect for the company's phones.

data.title: Monday Apple Rumors: 16-Inch MacBook Pro to Feature Slim Bezels
data.text:
Monday's Apple Rumors include a regulatory filing for new iPad models, 5G support coming to all of the new 2020 iPhone devices and more.

data.text: Can a stock with almost $1 trillion in market cap ever have a quiet 30% rally? Arguably, that’s the case with Apple Inc.

data.title: Should You Buy Apple ETFs Ahead of Q3 Earnings?
data.text: Apple has returned about 31.7% over the past three months, slightly outperforming the industry's gain of 31.1%. The momentum may continue if the company beats estimates in the soon-to-be reported quarter.

data.title: Apple Earnings Ahead: Focus Turns To Services Business As Some Fear Slowdown
data.text: Apple is scheduled to report fiscal Q3 earnings on Tuesday after the close, with analysts expecting earnings to fall year-over-year but seeing a slight rise in revenue.

data.title: Should You Buy Apple (AAPL) Ahead of Earnings?
data.text: Apple (AAPL) is seeing favorable earnings estimate revision activity and has a positive Zacks Earnings ESP heading into earnings season.

data.title: Apple target lifted at UBS ahead of earnings
data.text: UBS analyst Timothy Arcuri raised his price target on Apple Inc.'s stock AAPL, +0.35% to $235 from $225 on Monday, a day before the company is due to report fiscal third-quarter earnings.

data.title: The big challenge for Apple is offsetting its iPhone sales with its services, says Synovus's Daniel
data.text: As Apple prepares to release third-quarter earnings results, the White House has announced there will be no tariff relief for the company's parts and products made in China.

data.title: All three 2020 iPhones will support 5G to compete with Android, top analyst says
data.text: Low-cost 5G Android phones will force Apple's hand to add 5G to all three 2020 iPhones, according to TF Securities' Ming-Chi Kuo.

data.title: Apple’s 5G Modem Deal Isn’t a Reason to Buy AAPL Stock Yet
data.text: AAPL stock didn't move much on the news, but not because the news wasn't important for Apple stock. It's just going to take awhile for Apple to do something big with Intel's 5G modem technology and intellectual property.

data.title: Factors to Consider Ahead of Apple's (AAPL) Q3 Earnings
data.text: Apple's (AAPL) fiscal third-quarter results are expected to be hurt by lower iPhone sales, thereby putting the onus on the non-iPhone segments to perform.
